depreciation_rate.label: Depreciation rate
depreciation_rate.help_text: This value is in percentage. For example value: "100" means it depreciates during a year. Value: "25" means it depreciates during 4 years, and so on... .

force_depreciation.label: Force depreciation
force_depreciation.help_text: Check if you no longer want to bill for this asset

start_usage.label: Start usage
start_usage.help_text: Fill it if date of first usage is different then date of creation

configuration_path.label: Configuration path
configuration_path.help_text: path to configuration for this object, for example path to puppet class

default_depreciation_rate.help_text: This value is in percentage. For example value: "100" means it depreciates during a year. Value: "25" means it depreciates during 4 years, and so on... .

show_master_summary.label: Show master summary
show_master_summary.help_text: show master information on cluster page, ex. hostname, model, location etc.

configuration_path.label: Configuration path
configuration_path.help_text: path to configuration for this object, for example path to puppet class

path.label: Path
path.help_text: path is constructed from name of module and name of class

name.label: Name
name.help_text: module name (ex. directory name in puppet)

attribute_name.label: Attribute name
attribute_name.help_text: field name used in API. It's slugged name of the field

use_as_configuration_variable.label: Use as configuration variable
use_as_configuration_variable.help_text: When set, this variable will be exposed in API in "configuration_variables" section. You could use this later in configuration management tool like Puppet or Ansible.

depreciation_rate.label: Depreciation rate
depreciation_rate.help_text: This value is in percentage. For example value: "100" means it depreciates during a year. Value: "25" means it depreciates during 4 years, and so on... .

force_depreciation.label: Force depreciation
force_depreciation.help_text: Check if you no longer want to bill for this asset

start_usage.label: Start usage
start_usage.help_text: Fill it if date of first usage is different then date of creation

slot_no.label: Slot number
slot_no.help_text: Fill it if asset is blade server

configuration_path.help_text: path to configuration for this object, for example path to puppet class

configuration_path.help_text: path to configuration for this object, for example path to puppet class

website_type.label: Website type
website_type.help_text: Type of website which domain refers to.

website_url.label: Website url
website_url.help_text: Website url which website type refers to.

configuration_path.label: Configuration path
configuration_path.help_text: path to configuration for this object, for example path to puppet class

business_owner.label: Business owner
business_owner.help_text: Business contact person for a domain

technical_owner.label: Technical owner
technical_owner.help_text: Technical contact person for a domain

domain_holder.label: Domain holder
domain_holder.help_text: Company which receives invoice for the domain

valid_thru.label: Valid thru
valid_thru.help_text: Leave blank if this licence is perpetual

depreciation_rate.label: Depreciation rate
depreciation_rate.help_text: This value is in percentage. For example value: "100" means it depreciates during a year. Value: "25" means it depreciates during 4 years, and so on... .

accounting_id.label: Accounting id
accounting_id.help_text: Any value to help your accounting department identify this licence

start_usage.label: Start usage
start_usage.help_text: Fill it if date of first usage is different then date of creation

licence_type.label: Licence type
licence_type.help_text: Should be like 'per processor' or 'per machine' and so on.

hostname_template_postfix.label: Hostname template postfix
hostname_template_postfix.help_text: This value will be used as a postfix when generating new hostname in this network environment. For example, when prefix is "s1", postfix is ".mydc.net" and counter length is 4, following  hostnames will be generated: s10000.mydc.net, s10001.mydc.net, .., s19999.mydc.net.

use_hostname_counter.label: Use hostname counter
use_hostname_counter.help_text: If set to false hostname based on already added hostnames.

reserved_from_beginning.label: Reserved from beginning
reserved_from_beginning.help_text: Number of addresses to be omitted in DHCP automatic assignmentcounted from the first IP in range (excluding network address)

reserved_from_end.label: Reserved from end
reserved_from_end.help_text: Number of addresses to be omitted in DHCP automatic assignmentcounted from the last IP in range (excluding broadcast address)

reserved_from_beginning.label: Reserved from beginning
reserved_from_beginning.help_text: Number of addresses to be omitted in DHCP automatic assignmentcounted from the first IP in range (excluding network address)

reserved_from_end.label: Reserved from end
reserved_from_end.help_text: Number of addresses to be omitted in DHCP automatic assignmentcounted from the last IP in range (excluding broadcast address)

hostname_template_postfix.label: Hostname template postfix
hostname_template_postfix.help_text: This value will be used as a postfix when generating new hostname in this network environment. For example, when prefix is "s1", postfix is ".mydc.net" and counter length is 4, following  hostnames will be generated: s10000.mydc.net, s10001.mydc.net, .., s19999.mydc.net.

use_hostname_counter.label: Use hostname counter
use_hostname_counter.help_text: If set to false hostname based on already added hostnames.

require_position.help_text: Uncheck if position is optional for this rack (ex. when rack has warehouse-kind role

reverse_ordering.label: RU order top to bottom
reverse_ordering.help_text: Check if RU numbers count from top to bottom with position 1 starting at the top of the rack. If unchecked position 1 is at the bottom of the rack
